Exaggerate: The claim may exaggerate the extent of sanctions on Cuba compared to North Korea.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to validate the comparison between sanctions on Cuba and North Korea.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the level of sanctions on Cuba is higher than those on North Korea without providing concrete evidence or considering the broader international actions against North Korea.
Exist alternative explanation: Experts argue that while there may be some truth to the claim regarding U.S. sanctions on Cuba, it fails to consider the bigger picture of international actions against North Korea.
